command.name: codex-coordinator
command.description: Command orchestration tool for Codex - analyze requirements, recommend command chain, execute sequentially with state persistence

intent.primary_user_value: Turn a free-form task into an atomic Codex command pipeline, confirm it, then run it sequentially with resumable state.

must_not: Do not claim pointers are Existing unless verifiable in the repo.
Do not execute a partial Minimum Execution Unit unless user explicitly overrides.
Do not proceed to execution without explicit confirmation unless --auto-confirm is set.

p0: Allowed-tools matches described behavior (analyze + confirm + execute + persist state)
Core sections present: Overview, Usage, Execution Process, Output/Artifacts, Error Handling
Implementation pointers are labeled Existing vs Planned with dual-source evidence (docs + TS)
